title: April fools day joke was funny.

replies.body: Yasuo rework vid was better though.
Unranked SR games may be randomly selected for Advanced Bot testing. We appreciate your patience with any bugs or glitches you may encounter.

I got sucked in.. although I had a long as f*** day at work and didnt even take smite jg or any items in beginning so thats my excuse haha

Brain was/is mush.

Still demolished the team though :) I think I played way more aggressive thinking it was bots and did well haha.

I assumed it was legit because the enemy Katarina was actually scripting so during laning phase I was in belief.

I then realised Riot cannot code for shit and would never be able to make a decent AI.
